website_summaries.verdict: Small adapter hub that has a nice price point with finishes designed to match Apple products.
pros: Includes a USB C power port, two USB A 3.0 ports, and a 4K HDMI port
Offered in three color finishes that match Apple devices
With HDMI 2.0 cables attached, it will support 4K displays at 30Hz frame rates
Gives you a pass-through charging option
Small design that's easy to take anywhere
cons: Doesn't have as many ports as some others, so you'll have some limitations

customer_reviews.title: Great Docking Station for MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for to use with my 2017 MacBook Pro. I use this at work everyday to connect power (USB-C), an external USB keyboard, a USB wireless phone dongle, and an external HDMI monitor to my Mac. I have had no issues with any of the peripherals' power, connectivity, or signal transfer. A lot less expensive than Apple's version and it gives me a needed second USB port. Charging is fast and doesn't seem to be inhibited at all running through this dongle versus my USB-C power adapter being plugged directly into the MacBook. Color match is close to Apple's Space Gray, but not an exact match. This doesn't bother me, but may be important to some.
customer_reviews.author: kingfisher

customer_reviews.title: It is well made and it works.
customer_reviews.text: I just tested this thing out, and it works really well. It feels really well made, and the sockets have a firm and satisfying feel when I plug into them. The device really feels solid all the way around. Great for slide shows, etc. I plugged it in to my monitor, and it was ready to go right out of the box with no setup. Pros: Simple to use, responsive, feels high quality, and turns your phone into a desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Compact design, light, but solid, functions perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little hub. I use it daily with my Surface Book 2, both at home and school. The compact design fits unobtrusively in my backpack, and thus-far has survived numerous daily cycles of plugging, unplugging, and moving without a sign of wear. I regularly use the HDMI and the USB3 ports, but haven't had occasion to use the USB-C port yet, although as I understand it is just for charging, not data. I have purchased less expensive versions of this device from other manufacturers, but the cheap ones tends to break after a few uses or the cables separate at the ends. This device is very light weight, but it is also very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Carrico

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and provides necessary ports to extend your work/study-from-home experience
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted for my son's school issued Chromebook (Dell 3100). We truly appreciate the school providing the device, but it's small and slightly inconvenient to work from during extended sessions. The laptop screen is small and with this I'm able to add a 24" external display, wireless keyboard and mouse and keep charging the Chromebook with the pass thru charging. The adapter is also small enough that it doesn't take up any unnecessary space on his desk. Extremely happy with the build quality, feels substantial without being heavy. This is a great purchase if you need to connect external devices and are limited by connectivity options.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Officer

customer_reviews.title: Even with Dell Charger it couldn't charge XPS 13
customer_reviews.text: I used and immediately returned this product that I was attempting to use with my XPS 13 2018 version. I plugged it into the USB C port and powered it with the standard Dell 45 Watt USB C charger. If the laptop was started from a full shutdown it lead to a BIOS error and if plugged in after it said that it wasn't charging. I did not try this on other USB C devices for risk of causing damage but it most definitely didn't work with the XPS 13.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Reinhardt

customer_reviews.title: Mac OS Compatibility Issues / Build Issues
customer_reviews.text: We are an almost all-Mac environment; within the last two years we've begun to migrate out old machines for the newer MacBook Pros that have only USB-C connections. We've purchased several types and brands of USB-C hubs, including Apple's official adapters. Of the 5 Trianium USB-C hubs we've purchased, 3 have had issues. 1 has completely failed within the first year of use and 2 have USB-A port issues when using a wireless Logitech keyboard/mouse combo. I've resorted to moving the Logitech USB receiver to a separate USB-C -> USB-A adapter, which isn't ideal. Hope this helps others who may be configuring a similar setup.
customer_reviews.author: Click Rain, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Small size and great for on the go use!
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived and worked as described. The aluminum body is great for harsh handling. Two USB 3 ports worked great and the HDMI port allows me to extend to my external monitor or TV. The power pass-through is a real good feature to keep my tablet powered and charged while working with an external monitor. The one thing I wished it could support was power to the USB 3 port so I can connect an external hard drive like the WD Element.
customer_reviews.author: Jack in the Box

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT--MORE THAN EXPECTED!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't really sure if this was what I needed when I ordered it. What I needed was more USB ports for my laptop. What I got was AMAZING because it not only gives me more USB ports, but it also gives me a 4k HDMI port so I can use my laptop with a projector for work presentations. And the best part--it works on my home laptop and my work Macbook! The quality is outstanding and I would have expected to pay a lot more for this adapter. I feel like I got way more for my money. I am in love with this gadget!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Will update this review as it changes. Just got this today. Plugs into Macbook fine. USB-C power passthrough works great. HDMI output works great. The two USB 3.0 ports do not work. Build quality is excellent. Color matches my gold MacBook perfectly. I have emailed the provided @gmail addresses and will update as this progresses. I am going to assume that I just have a faulty one right now. Update: Reached out to customer service. They attempted to troubleshoot over email which failed. Most likely a faulty device. They shipped me a new one and it works perfectly. Both USB 3.0 ports work, HDMI works and power passthrough USB-C.
customer_reviews.author: Lungpai

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: I like it because the color (gold) matches my MacBook exactly. The chargethrough on the USB-C works well, and the other two hubs for USB work as described too. My only concern is that it is very expensive. I could have bought one that was $10 cheaper, with the same connectivity, but gray. I bought it because it matches, so I guess it is ok. All-in-all, I am happy with this item. If only the cording could be black to match the MacBook Keyboard!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well until it suddenly didn’t work at all
customer_reviews.text: Everything was working well until one day the HDMI port broke. I tried everything I could think of, and it still did not work. Frustrating because I really enjoyed it before that happened, and would easily give a 5-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Chupp

customer_reviews.title: Died after a  month
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in June 2018, but didn't start using it until January 2019 when I added an external monitor to my Macbook Pro. It worked just fine from Jan. 8th until Jan 31st when it suddenly died. The message on my laptop said, "USB Accessories Disabled. Unplug the accessory using too much power to re-enable USB devices." It always ran a little warm but nothing to be worried about. Even now when it has cooled down if I plug it in by itself, the above message pops up immediately.
customer_reviews.author: techguy

customer_reviews.title: Elegant design, but is it sturdy?
customer_reviews.text: So far (a few weeks), I love it. Elegant design, just the right ports (for me), seems sturdy. Follow-up 2019 Dec 28: Sigh. After a little over a year, the wire connecting to the USB-C port on the computer started becoming an intermittent connection - if I so much as looked at it funny (ok, ok, if I bumped it very slightly), it would disconnect and reconnect if I jiggled it. I have always treated my computer connections with kid gloves ever since I lost a USB port on a laptop many years ago. I got slightly larger model from Lention and have not had this problem. I have reduced from 5 stars to only 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: J. F. Kelley, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: After some use, cable is breaking down!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item in 2018 and everything worked well at the beginning. After more than 1 year of use, the white cable is breaking down and has turned very sticky. Not sure whether you can see from my picture, the white cable has cracked as well. This is due to a low-quality material being used in the cable part. There is a white plastic part next to the HDMI opening that has come out as well. I am disappointed as I bought one of the most expensive adaptors in 2018 and expected the product to last a long time. :(
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Good Cable, 4k only at 30Hz
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking cable. Works well, but 4k resolution at 30Hz is a deal breaker for me. Makes games or moving windows around on my 4k monitor terrible. Giving it 3 stars for the look and quality of the adaptor. They should have stated that these top out at 30Hz refresh rate for 4k.
customer_reviews.author: Pon

customer_reviews.title: Super Sleek
customer_reviews.text: Received this free product in return for an honest review. First off this is a good looking piece of equipment. super sleek and modern looking without feeling bulky. I keep it in my briefcase and use it every time I pull my laptop out. It is great for added slots when you need them without losing the ability to charge. It is not the cheapest but definitely worth the price and it is of great value.
customer_reviews.author: Maxim D. Nasab

customer_reviews.title: Makes disconnecting from peripherals so much faster.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with my Type C Hub purchase for my MacBook Pro (13-inch, 2017, Two Thunderbolt 3 ports). Immediately synced the monitor via the HDMI and the charging pad for iPhone. I flipped the charger for the laptop all onto the same Thunderbolt port. Makes it a lot easier and faster to disconnect the laptop from all the peripherals versus unplugging everything separately. I will consider buying other products in this line, as it seems to be of good quality and sturdy. Nice value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Geissler

customer_reviews.title: Great USB-C hub - small - well built - works great
customer_reviews.text: I just received my new USB-C hub and love it. Nice build quality. Look and feel is great. Works well and usb connections are tight (not sloppy). Best of all is it’s quite small and very easy to carry. I have tried a lot of hubs and like this one the best! I am using this primarily with a Windows tablet and it works well. USB and HDMI have all been stable. Cord length is ok (maybe 1" more would help with tablet in vertical position). VGA port would have made this just awesome, but I don't use this often and would rather keep size small.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Mini Docking Station
customer_reviews.text: This product is no different than a docking station but really compact. It helps me with my Lenovo X1 carbon. With a small device I am able to connect multiple devices that I need on day to day basis. This is even helpful when in meetings to be able to project using HDMI. Carrying separate converters are expensive and cumbersome. I really like this and recommend it to anyone who goes through similar situation.
customer_reviews.author: Innovation

customer_reviews.title: Small, Sleek and Simple
customer_reviews.text: I love this little gadget very much! Upon opening the box, I was instantly surprised how heavy and sturdy it was. I bought the gray color and impressed at how sleek and shiny it is - it looks more expensive than it actually is! I always feel like I have a mess of wires coming from my MacBook Air laptop, or that I have to choose what to plug in because my laptop only has 2 USB ports. I like how this has an extra USB C port, two USB 3 ports, and an HDMI port. I now feel I can effectively complete my work and charge my devices faster and efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Hana Banana

customer_reviews.title: Works on both my Chromebook and Macbook Pro (2018)
customer_reviews.text: I've been messing around buying separate adapters and finally figured out this device is simply what I needed. On both my Samsung Chromebook Pro as well as Macbook Pro (2018 model), it works to power a 27" 2560x1440 monitor, another USB hub used for all of my misc. devices (keyboard, mouse, external DAC), AND very importantly, I can plug in my the laptops' power adapter and it passes through the power. One plug into the laptop and it's good to go. So far so good -- been one week and holding up. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: G. Manfredi

customer_reviews.title: it works like an on/off switch
customer_reviews.text: Well, all the connections work, the HDMI and USB3 ports work, the pass through charging works. One big downside is that it kills my WIFI, it works like an on/off switch, not plugged in, wifi works fine, plugged in, wifi totally dies. I read it's due to these cheaper dongles interfering with the wifi antenna especially at the 2.4ghz range. Oh well, live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: A. Polak

customer_reviews.title: Does Its Job in a Slick Package
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. It has four jacks on it, a tiny blue power LED, and one plug and they all do what they are supposed to do. It has very high build quality with an aluminum enclosure. The only unexpected thing -- and this is not a problem of the adapter itself -- is that when I run my Win 10 HP Spectre laptop power supply through it, the HP insists on giving me a message about using an authentic HP power supply.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Butler

customer_reviews.title: Solid and well designed.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Trianium USB C Hub Adapter for about a week with a new MacBook Pro. This is a solid and very well designed dock, it works flawlessly with all my externals. Tried two other adapters which stopped working and/or did not recognize some drives...frustrating. So far, this is exactly what I needed, I use the USB ports and recharge throughout the day for business. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M Whitcomb

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected, caveats should be more explicit
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, the only issue I have is with the description of the item. It doesn't charge an ASUS laptop I have, and even though I found the small print mentioning that after I received it. It says "Charge and connect your favorite device", but at the end of the large product description that includes very large images it says in a small font that it doesn't support the ASUS laptop, so yeah, I bet I'm not the only one who fell for that.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and nice and small
customer_reviews.text: I have very little working knowledge of computers other than the standard office work on word and excel. If there was an issue I simply called IT. After retirement I needed to set up my new laptop at home but I still wanted to use my old keyboard and monitor. My son said order the TypeC Hub20 it will be easy and it was! I have had now problems with the device and it has worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah G.

customer_reviews.title: Simple + Reliable + Well-built
customer_reviews.text: No software install needed; this is plug-and-play with my Macbook Pro (2017). I bought this to extend my desktops since I've always preferred having a second, larger screen. The USB 3 ports have been reliable, the pass-through USB-C charging has worked well, and the HDMI output display has been working perfectly. I had previously bought (and ultimately returned) a more expensive one from another seller on Amazon before I purchased this one. This one has a far more reliable display output (HDMI) which has been working smoothly since day one without any hiccups and quick detection of external displays from my laptop; the other one had bad HDMI and VGA ports which stopped working after a day.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Did not work with Apple Cinema Display
customer_reviews.text: The HDMI display port did not work with my Apple Cinema Display (2005) connected by a DVI to HDMI adapter to my MacBook 12-inch. Switched to the Apple USBC Digital AV Multiport Adapter (with the same third-party DVI to HDMI adapter in between) and that worked fine. My guess is that the Apple adapter worked because it supports both 60Hz and 30Hz for the HDMI display, where the Trianium is only 30Hz.
customer_reviews.author: Cyber Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Usb doesn’t charge phone
customer_reviews.text: Charging is BS. I tried plugging in my 12” macbook usb-c charger while charging my phone via usb and lo and behold! It didn’t work! Yes, my phone recognizes it was connected to a charger but gained maybe 2% of battery over the course of 45 minutes! Design was nice, functionality, not so much. Picked up the apple one used on here and haven’t looked back.
customer_reviews.author: YoungProfessional

customer_reviews.title: Very Convenient and Portable!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! I like the placement of the adapters. The cable is relatively short, so it's not too much to manage when packing in my computer bag. Some people might like the cable to be slightly longer, but it fits my needs. I am constantly using my USB connections for my business so it is convenient to have an extra few adapters to use! The product is well made. It doesn't feel too cheaply made. The color scheme of the Hub matches my Macbook Pro. I don't get much use out of the extra USB C input, but I'm sure someone else would find it useful. Overall it's a great product and I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: DBLUV

customer_reviews.title: Solved more problems than I knew I had!
customer_reviews.text: This little gem solved some major problems with my MacBook, and has been a super-helpful addition to my cluttered desk. Wow, I really, REALLY wish I knew about this earlier. I added two USB cord extenders so my keyboard and mouse are threaded behind my desk to the shelf underneath. The power goes right through it to my computer and we're just plain happy!
customer_reviews.author: gettin' older

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it on an ASUS Flip. It gives me two extra USB 3 ports without taking away any of the existing USB C ports. Now I can use all my existing USB devices. All this and an HDMI port as well! Not only that, but I can use the USB C port on the dongle to charge my Chromebook. And all this in a sleek compact package. Now that is seriously cool.
customer_reviews.author: ValhallaSystems

customer_reviews.title: Excellent USB type C Hub
customer_reviews.text: If you purchased a new laptop computer without usb and comes with type C usb this product is for you. The product is surrounded in metal made very well and compliments my mac, has 2 usb 3.0 and 1 usb type c since this will use a1 of your type c usb. It has a HDMI which i tested and works but I would have no use for it since my mac has one built in.
customer_reviews.author: ALJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like how sturdy this adapter is. Right off the bat, you feel quality with the aluminum body. Nice USB 3 ports. I like the setup as well. to have 2 USB ports as well as a USB c port to charge and pass through data is great. Also, a full HDMI port is awesome. I haven't really gotten to test the speed of this laptop considering I don't have a USB C laptop. But, I can say this product has a lot of potential. Overall, Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: HDMI worked for about a week, then charging MacBook Pro stopped, and product completely died.
customer_reviews.text: The product seems decent so far. Everything worked out of the box. One issue we have noticed is that plugging the MacBook Pro charger cord into the hub makes the external display stop working sometimes (the one plugged into the HDMI), so we’ve resorted to plugging the charger directly into the MacBook, separate from the hub. Not sure if the USB-C port is supposed to only be used for a phone or what the issue is. Edit (03/01/2019): Product has completely stopped working. Hub stopped charging device, then got really hot, and all functionality stopped.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Windows/PC
customer_reviews.text: Hi there, Perhaps I am not smart about this; however, my Asus only has a micro HDMI and then the USB 3. When I plug this into my computer and then put the HDMI cable from my monitor, nothing happens. I know it works well with MAC, but not PC.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Steadman

customer_reviews.title: Iffy Connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, feels good, seems to connect well, but I have to jiggle and push the connector either at the usb a/b or the usb/c connector before I get a connection. Bummer. It looks so good...but the connection is unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Threefold Lotus Kwoon

customer_reviews.title: Nice dock!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice dock. It does everything it says, and it works quickly and automatically. It works with my external keyboard and mouse usb receiver, and with usb flash drives as well. It is a must have tool for these new laptops, some of which have only Type C ports.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with iPhone a
customer_reviews.text: This is not compatible with iPhone 11 or MacBook Air. It connects but is not recognized by my MacBook. The old version of this hub worked great. And Amazon said I cannot return it after just 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: P. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife to allow her to charge and run an external display on her MacBook at the same time. The HDMI port works as expected with a 32" HP Pavilion monitor. The USB-C passthrough allows charging at the same time, and two additional USB 3.1 ports allow additional peripherals. The Rose Gold color also matches the Rose Gold MacBook color. The slim but sturdy profile is also a nice touch. This is an excellent buy for a compact desktop docking station!
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: updated: DEX baby!
customer_reviews.text: Using with S8+ on external monitor via HDMI. Works perfectly. Update, this thing turns on Samsung DEX when I connect my power cord to it. I'm using DEx to type this, with a bluetooth keyboard and mouse. $20 as opposed to $99
customer_reviews.author: Kimball

customer_reviews.title: but overall very pleased. It works great with my Note 8
customer_reviews.text: The only thing it lacks is a built-in SD card reader, but overall very pleased. It works great with my Note 8. Looking forward to travel with it - a thin HDMI will pair nicely and I can watch anything from my phone on the hotel TV (unless they disable the HDMI ports). Charges the phone while using. Must have a charger plugged in to use it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jake A.

customer_reviews.title: Good For A Year
customer_reviews.text: If you don't mind replacing the adapter each year, it's a decent adapter. About 6 months in I started getting unusual Mac error / reboot issues caused by the faulty hardware. After a year it stopped working entirely, specifically the USB-C passthrough. Considering it's twice as expensive as competitors, I think I'll just pay half as much next time, if I'm going to have to replace it again each year.
customer_reviews.author: Diran

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality!
customer_reviews.text: I've had it a few days now and so far so good. The materials are great, feels like it was made by Apple. As shown in my photos I have this hooked up to another hub powering two monitors, keyboard, and mouse while at the same time charging the 2017 MacBook 12" (computer performs well!). It's great to have the HDMI in case I need to use it for presentations. We'll see how long this lasts and I will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: JoeUTVol

customer_reviews.title: Pass-through power does not work on Dell XPS, but works great otherwise
customer_reviews.text: This works fine as a USB-hub for my Dell XPS 13 9360, but the pass-through does not work. It seems as though it provides enough power to not use the battery, but the computer gives a warning that it is not charging and does not charge. This makes it fine to use, but annoying that to charge the computer I need to disconnect the USB-C from the dongle and attach it directly, negating much of the reason I got this. Other than that, it looks great, is well built and reduces a lot of cable clutter.
customer_reviews.author: Topher S.

customer_reviews.title: Great dock
customer_reviews.text: I have had three other docks before this one and all have been sub par compared to this one. This supports my Mac , my mouse, my monitor, my phone and my jump drive, while keeping my Mac charged. I’m am very happy with this dock!
customer_reviews.author: Maryann De Paolis Protasiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but not working with Huawei P30 Pro
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality, reliable in my laptop, and on my Huawei P20 smartphone. Unfortunately, the Huawei P30 Pro does not recognize it, and customer service was not able to give a solution for that.
customer_reviews.author: The honorable

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a desktop Hub
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a desktop hub for my MacBook Pro. I have the monitor and power, and a Logitech USB receiver plugged into it. Now I just plug my laptop into it and I have my desktop solution all ready to go. Only downside is that it gets really warm.
customer_reviews.author: Alan G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I haven't had any problems with it and enjoy the product thoroughly
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly on my Mac. I had originally purchased another brand that was cheaper but it led to problems with HDMI. I haven't had any problems with it and enjoy the product thoroughly. It's not too bulky and offers all the inputs I need
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: USB C Hub Adapter
customer_reviews.text: USB C Hub Adapter is light weight. Easily usable and has worked with everything ou have tried so far. So much simpler to use this device rather than switching through several devices.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great! I use it for 2fa devices and power for my work MacBook Pro since it's only got two USB C ports and I like to use an external monitor via the other USB C port. Build quality feels excellent, extremely easy to use
customer_reviews.author: rs69

customer_reviews.title: Good overall hub but overheats
customer_reviews.text: This hub works great but I wish it were a little longer and it wouldn’t get so hot with use. I mainly use it to connect my MacBook Air to wireless keyboard/mouse and second monitor and it gets very hot after not too long. Hasn’t affected performance yet but just worries me - it gets hot enough I yank my hand back whenever I accidentally brush past it.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Nice, compact USB-C hub
customer_reviews.text: Works fine so far with my GPD Pocket laptop. A little picky about the order I plug things in, but I think this is the laptop, not the hub as all the hubs I have tried with it are the same (the ones that work at all). This is a really compact hub: 4.25" x 1.05" x 0.4" plus about a 5" cable.
customer_reviews.author: Dale E. Utz

customer_reviews.title: great tool
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product so I could hook up the Amazon Fire stick to a non smart tv. I found this easy to use and I enjoy the extra length cord it came with for extending the dmi cable. It is a bit longer than I thought it would be and this is why it is given 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't overheat
customer_reviews.text: I use this USB C adapter every day with a MacBook Pro to run an external monitor via HDMI, Bluetooth speakers (USB), and a wireless mouse (USB). It works well, but of course another USB port would be nice. Seems a little pricey, too. Important note: It does not overheat. This was an issue with another dongle I bought, which had to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: DMM

customer_reviews.title: Great little hub!
customer_reviews.text: Great little hub. Nice slim size. Works perfect with both my Macbook pro and Microsoft Surface go. Supports full wattage USB-PD charging and HDMI output without any glitches.
customer_reviews.author: J M

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Gets a little warm after an hour or so of heavy use. Connections are tight. Just what my Lenovo Miix510 needed (no bidirectional usb-c charging supported on Miix). Haven't tried the HDMI out yet.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Type C hub!
customer_reviews.text: Plugged this into my MacBook Pro and found it very useful. I have multiple devices that needs charging or needs to be plugged in the computer. This hub helps you do just that. Overall, great product and good quality. if you are like me and have multiple devices that needs to be connected to your computer, this is what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great muti tool and so useful
customer_reviews.text: I just love this. I can charge my son's switch and whatever i need at the same time. With HDMI there's many possibilities I can't wait to try things out. I like that I can just add it to my bag without taking up alot of space. .I'm definitely going to tell my friends and family about it.
customer_reviews.author: BetsyB

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The cord has a bit of a permanent dent from bending to fit inside the loop inside the holding pouch, but otherwise this is great. I haven't used the ethernet or HDMI ports yet, but the pass-through charging and USB ports work great!
customer_reviews.author: mandyrin

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!  Plug and Play!
customer_reviews.text: Plug it in and Go! No install or anything required. Pass through charging works great. Two additional USB 3.0 ports, plus an HDMI port. Works great with a laptop. Mine only has one USB 3.0 port plus two USB C ports. So this triples the number of available USB 3.0 port I have.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome USB-C hub for MacBook Pro or other USB-C Device
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product as a docking station for my MacBook Pro. I had looked into other USB-C but they costed much more than this one. My main goal was to be able to connect my MacBook Pro to my HDMI monitor. This device works great for that with the added feature of having USB ports. Now, I just need to purchase another one for my second Samsung Curved Monitor.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moses

customer_reviews.title: Reliable USB C to HDMI adapter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to connect my smartphone to my TV. I needed it to have to have pass-through charging and extra USB ports, which led me to try this out. I'm impressed by the build quality and I was able to connect my phone to my TV with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay T. Lydell

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have the heat or warm mentioned by others with my 87w charger even Very good quality, tried only one day but feels good enough for long run
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, but potential issues with HDMI port
customer_reviews.text: Tested the USB-C hub adapter with new Asus C302CA-DHM4 Chromebook, found that USB-A and USB-C ports work as expected, pass-through charging works mostly as expected, and HDMI port does not fully work as expected. HDMI tested with multiple display devices and cables, found that display is very bright and washed out when outputting at 1080p, but fine at lower resolutions; not tested with any other device besides Chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon A

customer_reviews.title: Definitely A Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This Hub adapter works wonders! It isnt a bad product either as it is very sturdy and has a good weight to it. It is very useful if you have the new macbook where the only connection is the USB-C hole. It is quick and allows you attach more connections to it at once. Great item and great colors!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Chan

customer_reviews.title: Gets hot! See pictures.
customer_reviews.text: All the features worked just fine. Tried it out for a little less than an hour and was surprised how hot the adapter got! I had my screen plugged in, power, keyboard and was charging my bluetooth speaker when I took the pictures. Trust in this product is gone. Too bad I can't return it!
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Great value and functionality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Does exactly what it was designed for. Would be nice if the type C 'in' would allow video passthrough. However, you can't have everything.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, looks good. Obviously, I just bought it so it is difficult to comment on the durability but it feels like it has been manufactured well. I will update if there any issues but as of right now I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Danger

customer_reviews.title: Worked on the first try.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the TypeC Hub20 to connect my laptop to the KVM and multiple monitors on my desk. It worked on the very first try with no issues. There is no noise or artifacts on the monitors at full 4k resolution and I am quite happy.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Rubin

customer_reviews.title: Works like a Champ
customer_reviews.text: Great power for charging phone, ports work flawlessly. if it had one more port, would be the absolute perfect charger
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: Solid build, great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very well built hub. This fits perfectly for my lifestyle, as I'm always on the go and travel. This hub is built solid with a great looking finish and seems like it will withstand long term rough use. It works just as described, with a a USB C out, a couple more USB 3 and an HDMI.
customer_reviews.author: SamKQboro

customer_reviews.title: Pass-through doesn't work as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work. My laptop doesn't charge when used as pass-through, it loses power.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: USB-Z
customer_reviews.text: Works well on my MacBook 13” it’s unfortunate that the models don’t have usb-a but usb-c is the future. (Until usb-d or something comes)
customer_reviews.author: Hye Seo

customer_reviews.title: Super durable
customer_reviews.text: First thing you notice about this device is that it is metal. It’s not flimsy at all, will work great for just throwing it in the bag with no worry about it getting busted. My laptop (HP 850 G3) didn’t support video over usb-c, so make sure your machine supports it before to buy it. As a USB hub, it will work great.
customer_reviews.author: Webberjk

customer_reviews.title: Sound not working well
customer_reviews.text: Everything works as expected but when connected to the monitor, I lose sound sometimes and need to disconnect and reconnect the cable I order to get sound to work. Not sure if I just have a bad one or not.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: nad love this little gadget
customer_reviews.text: Have a MacBook Pro 2012, nad love this little gadget. Works great and detected the usb really quick. Since I don’t have a usb c por, with an adapter works great. Love it very well built and it does not feel cheap material..
customer_reviews.author: Luis C.

customer_reviews.title: great little hub
customer_reviews.text: I like how the hub’s color matches my computer (2017 MacBook Pro, Space Gray) exactly. Its compact size is also great—easy to carry around without adding much weight. All the ports are pretty straightforward and appear to be working great.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and useful
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought the type C hub and really like how small and streamline the design is. it fits all the attachments that i need and allows me to charge my computer while using everything i need. overall a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Gila R Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Meh. It works well as a device hub, ...
customer_reviews.text: Meh. It works well as a device hub, but it doesn't let enough voltage through to keep my Galaxy Book charged. It will trickle charge, but every few hours I have to plug directly into the factory charger to keep it from dying.
customer_reviews.author: ibuytoomuchjunk

customer_reviews.title: Returned product because the HDMI output didn't work consistently.
customer_reviews.text: Returned product because the HDMI output didn't work consistently. When I plugged it into my MacBook Pro, sometimes I got a clear picture and other times the output was garbled. USB ports seemed fine. Didn't try charging my computer through it.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Braswell

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable, works great with Windows 10 and Ubuntu laptops
customer_reviews.text: This is the most widely supported Type-C to HDMI device I've used. I wish there was a dual display version.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Working great
customer_reviews.text: Working great... no issues with device comparability, either HDMI or USB. Any legacy hardware I have plugged into it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works well EXCEPT
customer_reviews.text: Handy, light weight, woks well with my MacBook . . . Charges MacBook while providing USB connection to other devices, ie. printer. However, does not provide power to the USB port supporting the external DVD drive.
customer_reviews.author: Good News

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: works great, the build quality is very good. This is a lot cheaper then other ones on the market and it does the same job. I got this over the apple one for half the price and i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Solz

customer_reviews.title: This is the one, people!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so cool! The color and build quality are spectacular. This thing works great for my use. I’m adding a couple external drives to my machine and the speed is awesome! This is the one, people!!
customer_reviews.author: Jon H.

customer_reviews.title: bad
customer_reviews.text: has done a perfect job so far. UPDATED: i spoke too soon. it causes buzzing and weird power issues with other USB devices, the USB c port does not work. fail.
customer_reviews.author: Jered Mckenna

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work. Won’t charge my iPad while plugged into the usb and video out from HDMI is bad. Wasted $40.
customer_reviews.author: B. Almnrd

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a couple of uses
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a couple of months but have only needed to use it a handful of times. After a couple of uses, it is corrupting file transfers and just not working. Get an apple sanctioned product instead.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Windows 10 Mobile.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and connected it to my Alcatel Idol 4S Windows edition and it's great. I hooked my phone to my TV and external hard drive. I also connected normal USB mouse and it was perfect. Love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ammar Salman

customer_reviews.title: This is really a great product it’s well built and easy to hookup your ...
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great product it’s well built and easy to hookup your device to stream video straight to your tv. I recommend if you don’t have a smart tv. Disclaimer I was provided this free of cost for my unbiased review.
customer_reviews.author: K D B Jr

customer_reviews.title: great product with great quality and very convenient price!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. The design and functionality is really great! thanks for this great product with great quality and very convenient price! I will recommend it to my friends !
customer_reviews.author: n

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I found I did nor really need this item, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: GG in MN

customer_reviews.title: Trianium USB Hub Yoga 930
customer_reviews.text: Used on a Lenovo Yoga 930 with a 27 in. second monitor Absolutely the coolest looking hub I've ever owned. The HDMI & two extra usb ports are essential, the type C with power makes it perfect for portable operation with a Pixel phone.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Y

customer_reviews.title: HDMI port stopped working after single use
customer_reviews.text: HDMI port initially worked the first time I used it then stopped working after that. Given other positive reviews its possible I received a defective product and may not be applicable to all. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Merle

customer_reviews.title: Overall pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: Overall pleased with this product! I got it connected to my MacBook Pro and having an extra usb ports plus hdmi is a plus! I've uploaded 4 pictures; its nicely packaged and really not a big device at all. No issues to report. A+
customer_reviews.author: IT Guy

customer_reviews.title: Best USB C Hub Adapter
customer_reviews.text: Bough it for work, we like how slim and sleek it is. The color is nice as well, we got the dark grey to match the color of the laptop better. We got this one to replace a defective hub but also wanted something that had fewer ports (Don't need that many). This one checked all the boxes and was not that expensive either. Total win!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Works as designed
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for several months now to connect an HDMI external monitor and USB hard drive to a 15" MacBook Pro and it has been working flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Pape

customer_reviews.title: Great product support
customer_reviews.text: The product works exactly as advertised. I initially had difficulty getting this to connect correctly to my Lenova laptop but the problem turned out to be the video settings on my laptop. The people at Trianium were patient and made suggestions to troubleshoot the problems, even sending me another hub adapter to try.
customer_reviews.author: Tennessee Family

customer_reviews.title: Super sleek and feels well made in the hand
customer_reviews.text: Super sleek and feels well made in the hand. An additional benefit is that is matches the aluminium design most computers are sporting these days. It is very good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Austin E.

product_meta.title: USB C Hub Adapter, Trianium Aluminum Multi Port Charger Dock USB Type C to HDMI / USB C / 2 USB-A 3.0 Port [Pass-Through Charging] For Macbook Pro,Chromebook, Phone,Hard Flash Drive,Other USB C Laptop
feature_bullets: Charge and connect your favorite device, including watching audio and video in 4K resolution for a convenient all-in-one adapter. Aluminum design complements Apple MacBook computers and accessories.

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL: Ultra-fast data transfer with the included 2x USB A 3.0 ports and a USB Type-C port. Use the hub’s 4K HDMI Port to output video from your computer to a HD monitor. (Note: 1. For the HDMI port, please use HDMI 2.0 Cables for optimal performance; Supports Up to 4k display at 30Hz. 2. The length of built-in Type C cable is 4.5-inch long).
USB TYPE C INPUT: Specifically designed for Type-C products. Type-C charge through for the Macbook Pro 2016/2017 (w/ Touchbar), Chromebook, and other USB-C devices.

EASY TO USE: Just plug and play. It’s that simple! No additional installation or software necessary. The included pass-through charging type c port, you can easily charge your computer without sacrificing your Type-C port.
QUALITY DESIGN: Small, compact, and perfect for travel. An aesthetic accessory made of a durable aluminum frame. Backed by Trianium’s one-year warranty guaranteed to our valued customers.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars359 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
